docs.lead_paragraph: DAVIS, Calif., April 9 While the nation has been worrying about problematical dangers of high-powered farm pesticides, supposedly innocuous farm chemicals have been contaminating many urban water sources.

headline.main: FARM CHEMICALS POLLUTING WATER; Peril of Excessive Nitrates Reported at Coast Parley

docs.abstract: Conf on pollution from solid and agr wastes, Davis, Calif, discusses underground seepage of nitrates, 1 of main bases of fertilizers, and their accumulation in wells; conf sponsored by PHS, Calif U and Calif water agencies
docs.snippet: DAVIS, Calif., April 9  While the nation has been worrying about problematical dangers of high-powered farm pesticides, supposedly innocuous farm chemicals have been contaminating many urban water sources.

byline.original: By GLADWIN HILL Special to The New York Times
